baseSalary.title: Base Salary
baseSalary.description: The base salary of the job.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.description: Description of benefits associated with the job.

datePosted.title: Date Posted
datePosted.description: Publication date for the job posting.

educationRequirements.title: Education Requirements
educationRequirements.description: Educational background needed for the position.

employmentType.title: Employment Type
employmentType.description: Type of employment (e.g. full-time, part-time, contract, temporary, seasonal, internship).

experienceRequirements.title: Experience Requirements
experienceRequirements.description: Description of skills and experience needed for the position.

incentives.title: Incentives
incentives.description: Description of bonus and commission compensation aspects of the job.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: The industry associated with the job position.

occupationalCategory.title: Occupational Category
occupationalCategory.description: Category or categories describing the job. Use BLS O*NET-SOC taxonomy: http://www.onetcenter.org/taxonomy.html. Ideally includes textual label and formal code, with the property repeated for each applicable value.

qualifications.title: Qualifications
qualifications.description: Specific qualifications required for this role.

salaryCurrency.title: Salary Currency
salaryCurrency.description: The currency (coded using ISO 4217, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217 used for the main salary information in this job posting.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Skills required to fulfill this role.

specialCommitments.title: Special Commitments
specialCommitments.description: Any special commitments associated with this job posting. Valid entries include VeteranCommit, MilitarySpouseCommit, etc.

workHours.title: Work Hours
workHours.description: The typical working hours for this job (e.g. 1st shift, night shift, 8am-5pm).
